DOC.brief_summary: This primary objective study compare efficacy , safety , tolerability tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( TDF ) versus adefovir dipivoxil ( ADV ) treatment pre-core mutant chronic hepatitis B . Participants receive TDF ADV 48 week ( double-blind ) . After 48 week , eligible participant switch open-label TDF 480 week .
